title: [Placements] How hard it is to switch to a 12 lpa+ company from a tier 3 service based company after a year as the experience .
content:
Will the employers look and judge you based on your previous company even if you have the skills?  is grinding dsa all over again necessary.   
Graduates pls answer? I know the examples of people who are working at google starting from tcs/infosys that's really one in a thousand .  I'm expecting more of a practical answer

Extremely hard to switch from a sbc to a pbc .

PBCs also don't value your experience in an SBC. For example, let's say you worked for 5 years but they will still offer you roles which need 1-2 years experience
